style_guide.visual_style: High-quality Korean webtoon style with clean digital illustration, soft natural colors, expressive faces, modern fashion, atmospheric lighting
style_guide.segment_story: A Hispanic male tourist in Seoul approaches a local Korean female for directions to the train station. She kindly responds with detailed directions, explaining he should go straight, turn left and right at specific points, and reassures him it's very close - about ten minutes away.
